title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, July 24, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, July 24, 2013
teaser: As President Obama embarks on his middle class road show, we ask what does the average American make? China's factories continue to struggle while the eurozone starts to see some positive economic signs. A check in on savings. And a button to make all that #royalbaby news go away.
byline: Gigi Douban, Shannon Mullen, Sabri Ben-Achour, Sam Beard, Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Katie Long, Bruce Johnson, Rahul Tandon, Adrienne Hill and David Brancaccio
description: As President Obama embarks on his middle class road show, we ask what does the average American make? China's factories continue to struggle while the eurozone starts to see some positive economic signs. A check in on savings. And a button to make all that #royalbaby news go away.
